event.description: Jean Segura singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder George Springer.
Mitch Haniger lines out to right fielder Josh Reddick.
Robinson Cano grounds out softly to first baseman Yuli Gurriel. Jean Segura to 2nd.
Nelson Cruz grounds out softly to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Kyle Seager grounds out sharply, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Danny Valencia pops out to shortstop Carlos Correa.
Leonys Martin called out on strikes.
Mike Zunino grounds out sharply, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Jarrod Dyson grounds out, shortstop Carlos Correa to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Jean Segura bunt grounds out, pitcher Dallas Keuchel to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Mitch Haniger strikes out swinging.
Robinson Cano singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Josh Reddick.
Nelson Cruz walks. Robinson Cano to 2nd.
Kyle Seager called out on strikes.
Danny Valencia walks. Robinson Cano to 3rd. Nelson Cruz to 2nd.
Leonys Martin grounds out, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Mike Zunino grounds out, shortstop Carlos Correa to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Jarrod Dyson flies out to left fielder Norichika Aoki.
Jean Segura strikes out swinging.
Mitch Haniger grounds out, shortstop Carlos Correa to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Robinson Cano pops out to shortstop Carlos Correa.
Nelson Cruz lines out sharply to center fielder George Springer.
Kyle Seager hit by pitch.
Danny Valencia grounds into a double play, pitcher Dallas Keuchel to second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Yuli Gurriel. Kyle Seager out at 2nd.
Leonys Martin bunt grounds out, pitcher Dallas Keuchel to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Defensive switch from center field to right field for George Springer.
Defensive switch from right field to left field for Josh Reddick.
Defensive Substitution: Jake Marisnick replaces left fielder Norichika Aoki, batting 9th, playing center field.
Pitching Change: Luke Gregerson replaces Dallas Keuchel.
Mike Zunino grounds out softly, third baseman Alex Bregman to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Jarrod Dyson strikes out swinging.
Jean Segura singles on a ground ball to shortstop Carlos Correa.
Mitch Haniger walks. Jean Segura to 2nd.
With Robinson Cano batting, wild pitch by Luke Gregerson, Jean Segura to 3rd. Mitch Haniger to 2nd.
Robinson Cano lines out to right fielder George Springer.
Pitching Change: Ken Giles replaces Luke Gregerson.
Nelson Cruz strikes out swinging.
Kyle Seager walks.
Danny Valencia strikes out swinging.
Leonys Martin called out on strikes.
George Springer homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Alex Bregman singles on a ground ball to center fielder Leonys Martin.
Jose Altuve strikes out swinging. Alex Bregman steals (1) 2nd base.
Carlos Correa lines into a double play, shortstop Jean Segura to second baseman Robinson Cano. Alex Bregman doubled off 2nd.
Carlos Beltran called out on strikes.
Josh Reddick singles on a line drive to left fielder Jarrod Dyson.
Yuli Gurriel grounds into a double play, shortstop Jean Segura to second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Danny Valencia. Josh Reddick out at 2nd.
Brian McCann strikes out swinging.
Norichika Aoki singles on a line drive to left fielder Jarrod Dyson.
George Springer reaches on catcher interference by Mike Zunino. Norichika Aoki to 2nd. George Springer to 1st.
Alex Bregman flies out to right fielder Mitch Haniger. Norichika Aoki to 3rd.
Jose Altuve strikes out swinging.
Carlos Correa homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Carlos Beltran strikes out swinging, catcher Mike Zunino to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Josh Reddick grounds out softly, first baseman Danny Valencia to pitcher Felix Hernandez.
Yuli Gurriel grounds out, third baseman Kyle Seager to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Brian McCann grounds out to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Norichika Aoki lines out to left fielder Jarrod Dyson.
George Springer strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Nick Vincent replaces Felix Hernandez.
Alex Bregman walks.
Jose Altuve singles on a line drive to left fielder Jarrod Dyson. Alex Bregman to 3rd.
Carlos Correa out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Leonys Martin. Alex Bregman scores.
Carlos Beltran flies out to center fielder Leonys Martin.
Pitching Change: James Pazos replaces Nick Vincent.
Josh Reddick grounds out, shortstop Jean Segura to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Yuli Gurriel grounds out sharply, second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Brian McCann grounds out, first baseman Danny Valencia to pitcher James Pazos.
